def: An instrument for drawing spiral lines on a plane.
Of or pertaining to the sternum and the thyroid cartilage.
Belonging to antipathy; opposite; contrary; allopathic.
A small box, can, or chest to keep tea in.
Fourfold; folded or doubled twice. Quadruplex system (ElectricTelegraph), a system by which four messages, two in each direction,may be sent simultaneously over the wire.
Without penal restraint; not punishable. [R.] Swift.
The condition or quality of being secure; exemption from fear;want of vigilance; security.
One who teaches or instructs a school.-- School"-teach`ing, n.
A shallow iron pan to hold glass ware while being annealed.
A judge in the Isle of Man who decides controversies withoutprocess. Cowell.
